item.description: Let's enjoy dinner at this really awesome restaurant! I've eaten here before and it was that good. Great night of dinner, conversation, and entertainment from the cooks. Here's the website so you all can check it out: http://www.sakecafewethersfield.com/main.htm Make sure to not be more than a half hour late due to seating. Come out to have dinner and let's enjoy the night! :)
item.how_to_find_us: Call or text me at 860-919-9782. If not I'll be the only tall red head in the place.
item.name: Dinner: Sake Cafe Hibachi Steakhouse and Sushi Bar
